sources.title: MEDITECH uses Gemini to improve regulated healthcare workflows | Google Workspace Blog
128 ways our customers are using AI for business | Google Workspace Blog

Google Cloud on X: "Using @GoogleWorkspace with Gemini, MEDITECH reduces manual tasks, such as note-taking, drafting documents, and revising emails—saving 7 hours per employee per week, which employees can then allocate to innovating on products and supporting customers ↓ https://t.co/9QKL3iENNQ" / X
